message: A couple of problems I've found with the solution to question two: (1) in the weighting formula, tau is not squared, and (2) the convention of setting x_0 to 1 is not followed: you'll see what should be an almost circular area surrounding the island of four triangles on the right stretch into an ellipse without the ability to learn an offset.
@zellyn just checking in. I am going to take a look at it tomorrow
